name: ProjectR
description:
ProjectR, or How I Traveresed The Dual Dimensional Plane To Stick It To The Evil Wizard Standing In The Way of Peace

Game Modes:

  • STORY - hand crafted level
  • SURVIVAL - infinite mode

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - movement
  • ESC - return to main menu 

Developers:

  • Matija Mikić
  • Vladimir Tričković
  • Aleksa Zdravković
  • Igor Stošić
  • Miodrag Mikić

Whole game was made during a 48h Global Game Jam event and was uploaded here with some minimal tweaks.
